translation.en: All right, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.ja: さて 会場の皆さん

translation.en: this is the moment we've been waiting for. The presenta--
translation.ja: いよいよ規定の15分です

translation.en: Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight?
-Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight! -[audience cheers]
translation.ja: ダニエル･ラルーソ戦います！

translation.en: Now, isn't this what it's all about, folks?
-[Johnny grunts] -[audience cheers]
translation.ja: ラルーソ　ロレンス

translation.en: -Fight! -[Johnny] Hyah!
[referee] Turn. Kneel.
Sweep the leg.
You have a problem with that?
No, Sensei.
No mercy.
That's two points, LaRusso. Lawrence, nothing.
[referee] One point, Lawrence!
[official] Point, Lawrence. 2-2.
-[referee] Illegal contact to the knee. -[boy 2] Finish him, Johnny!
[announcer] Whoever wins the next point will be our new champion!
translation.ja: 次のポイント獲得者が新王者です

translation.en: You finish him, Johnny! Finish him!
[announcer] The new champion, Daniel LaRusso!
translation.ja: 新王者 ダニエル･ラルーソ

translation.en: Hey, I'm Miguel. My family and I just moved into 109.
translation.ja: やあ 越してきたミゲルだ

translation.en: Great. More immigrants.
Actually, we're from Riverside.
I was wondering if you were having trouble with your water pressure,
'cause I know our sink's being weird right now and…
Oh, bottles go in the blue bins.
Listen, Menudo, I've lived in this shithole for over ten years.
translation.ja: タコス野郎俺は10年以上ここにいる

translation.en: The pipe's don't work. The fountain's full of piss. The only good thing here is that I don't have to talk to anybody.
translation.ja: 設備はボロいが静かに暮らせるのが利点だ

translation.en: So, nice knowing you.
OK, well…
have a nice day…
-[car door squeals loudly] -…I guess.
[Johnny] You've got to be kidding me.
translation.ja: 〝ラルーソ･オート〞 冗談だろ

translation.en: Not another one.
♪ Ha ha, yeah! ♪
[woman] Creep.
Sick.
-Hey! -[kid] Gotcha.
-What the hell is this? -Don't worry, it'll be level.
translation.ja: 何これ 水平にしてるとこだ

translation.en: I'm just lining it up.
You put it on the wrong wall! I said the wall across from the door.
translation.ja: 壁が違ってる ドアの向かいと言った

translation.en: -This is the wall across from the door. -Not that door, idiot. The door.
translation.ja: この壁だろ バカなの こっちよ

translation.en: Just move the TV. I have company coming over.
translation.ja: 人が来る　動かして

translation.en: Hold on. I'll have to fill the holes, remeasure, match the paint. It'll take an hour to get to the hardware store.
translation.ja: 待てよ 穴埋めや採寸店に行くだけで１時間かかる

translation.en: That's not my problem.
I'm not the dummy who put the TV on, literally, the only wall in the house that a TV would not go.
translation.ja: 私は最悪の壁を選んだバカじゃない

translation.en: Why can't a TV go on this…
Look, I'll come first thing in the morning and put it just the way you want it.
translation.ja: なあ 明日の朝イチでやるよ

translation.en: I just can't do it now.
That's just great. Not bad enough you took a shit in my powder room.
translation.ja: 最低 トイレも使ったくせに

translation.en: -You said that's where I should go. -I didn't know you'd take a shit!
OK, we'll figure this out, all right?
translation.ja: 分かった　何とかしよう

translation.en: Just quit bitching at me.
translation.ja: どなる(ビッチング)なよ

translation.en: What did you just call me?
No, no, no! I didn't call her a bitch. I said she was bitching at me.
translation.ja: クソ女(ビッチ)じゃなくてどなるなと言った

translation.en: There's a difference.
You're firing me because of that bitch?
You know what? I hated this damn job anyway. You better pay me what you owe me, Mike.
translation.ja: どうせ嫌な仕事だった残金は払えよ

translation.en: Mike?
[man on radio] Banzai!
[chuckles] I'm Daniel LaRusso. And at LaRusso Auto, we kick the competi--
translation.ja: ダニエル･ラルーソです競合を蹴散ら…

translation.en: That one.
Aren't you gonna wear gloves?
Can you put that on a plate?
[in English] My grandma's not feeling well.
Didn't ask. C'mon, what's Spanish for "Just give me my damn slice"?
translation.ja: 知るかスペイン語で“渡せ”は？

translation.en: [in English] What did you just say?
-What did he say? -You don't wanna know.
-I know it's something bad. Just tell me. -Uh, he said you have a tiny…
translation.ja: 悪口だとは分かる あなたの何かが小さいと

translation.en: He said I have a tiny wang?
Tell him he has a tiny wang.
-[in English] I speak English, asshole. -Oh really?
translation.ja: 英語も話す そうかよ

translation.en: Yo, Brucks, get the light beer this time. Gotta cut weight for the meet.
translation.ja: ライトビールだぞ　体を絞る

translation.en: -Hundo P, son! -[boy 2] Damn right.
[boy 3] Man, you should get some condoms too.
Finish up and then beat it!
-Excuse me? -[woman] This is my mart.
translation.ja: 何だい？ 私のシマだ

translation.en: You ain't hustling no coin at my mart.
I'm not hustling. I'm not homeless!
translation.ja: ホームレスじゃないよ

translation.en: That's my car.
[boy 2] What the hell are you doing? Why you gotta blow up my spot?
translation.ja: 邪魔すんな 大学生と思わせたのに

translation.en: -[Miguel] Dude, I-- -He thought we were in college.
translation.ja: 大学生と思わせたのに

translation.en: [Miguel] I didn't know you were trying to buy beer. Sorry.
-[Brucks] Yes, let's go. -[boy 3] What the hell are you doing?
translation.ja: いい気味だ 何だよ

translation.en: -Ooh, what do we got here? -[boy 4] What do you got? Pepto.
translation.ja: 中身は？ 下痢止めだ

translation.en: [boy 3] Oh shit. Someone has frickin' diarrhea!
[Brucks] Hey, we should call him 'Rhea.
Give it back, dude. It's for my grandma!
[boy 2] Oh, it's for your grandma? Shit, I'm sorry, man.
translation.ja: ばあちゃんの？　残念だな

translation.en: Hey, you want it? Hey, you can take all that shit.
translation.ja: 欲しいなら全部やるぜ

translation.en: -Take that! Yeah. -[boys laughing]
Bitch.
Asshole.
-[Brucks] Ooh! -[boy 2] What'd you say, 'Rhea?
I… I didn't say anything.
[boy 4] That's brute, Ky.
-[Ky] You crying? Where you going, pussy? -[Miguel groans]
Watch the car, man.
Who's this dude?
-Just leave the dork alone. -[Ky] What?
translation.ja: 彼に構うな 何なんだ

translation.en: You see this guy? Eating his dinner at the mini-mart like a bum.
translation.ja: 見ろよこんな所でお食事中か

translation.en: -[boys laugh] -[Ky] Wait, I think I know this guy. He's the jerk-off that cleaned my dad's septic tank.
translation.ja: こいつ 親父の浄化槽を掃除したアホだ

translation.en: That explains why he smells like shit.
Trust me, you are pissing off the wrong guy on the wrong day, all right?
-[Ky] Really? -Yeah, really.
Get the hell out of here, loser.
Let's get him.
[Brucks] Get off me!
-Holy shit. How did you-- -[Ky roars]
What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
Is that all you got, ladies?
[Brucks] Come on, Ky.
-Let's go. -[Ky] Get off me!
What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
[cop] Hey, get off the kid!
-[Johnny screams] -[Miguel] Hey! It's not his fault!
[Miguel] Hey, I just wanted to say thank you.
All right, well, you said it.
So, last night, was that, like, Tae Kwon Do or jujitsu or MMA or something?
translation.ja: 昨日の技はテコンドーか何か？

translation.en: It's karate.  Old-school karate.
-Do you think you could teach me? -What? No.
translation.ja: 教えてよ いや 断る

translation.en: Come on. When school starts, those guys will make my life miserable.
It's not my problem.
Look, if I just knew a little bit of what you knew, then I would be--
translation.ja: ほんの少しでも習えば…

translation.en: Forget it.
translation.ja: 忘れろ　やめたんだ

translation.en: I don't do karate anymore, all right? Besides, I need to find a job.
translation.ja: 忘れろ　やめたんだ それより職を探す

translation.en: Well, you could open your own karate school.
-It's called a dojo. -You could open your own dojo.
Look, I'm not getting into this with you.
I'm not even sure I'm allowed to be around kids right now.
translation.ja: 今の俺は子供に悪影響だ

translation.en: All right, you want my advice? Stop being so annoying.
Maybe you'll stop getting your ass kicked.
OK.
[woman on TV] …and have a life before I pass away. Any help Chuck can give her, we'd appreciate.
translation.ja: 私が死ぬ前にぜひチャックから支援を

translation.en: You got Encore?
Yes, ma'am. That's correct, Your Honor.
Who the hell are you?
You know those little red stickers that say "further reduced"? That means "spoiled."
translation.ja: “再値下げ”のシールは腐ってるという意味だ

translation.en: You know that, right?
You're eating bad meat, boy.
What the are you doing in my apartment, Sid?
Oh, that's some "thank you."
Who do you think bailed you out? Again.
translation.ja: また保釈してやったのに

translation.en: I never asked you for anything.
I think that little incident at Applebee's
translation.ja: ファミレスでの一件があったよな

translation.en: would've taught you to keep your hands to yourself.
translation.ja: 乱暴しないことを覚えたかと

translation.en: You know…
when I met your mom,
she really knocked my socks off.
Beautiful.
Blonde.
Tan.
Tight.
-[groans] -[Sid] Little did I know I'd be taking care of her schmuck kid forever.
translation.ja: だがバカ息子を永遠に養うハメになるとは

translation.en: [Johnny] Yeah, Sid, you were the stepfather of the century.
translation.ja: シドは世紀の継父だよ

translation.en: Well, high praise, coming from a world-class daddy like you.
translation.ja: なんと 世界屈指の父親からお褒めにあずかった

translation.en: How old is Robby now, 15, 16?
translation.ja: ロビーは15？　16歳か最後に会ったのは？

translation.en: -When's the last time you saw him? -Just get the hell out of here.
translation.ja: ロビーは15？　16歳か最後に会ったのは？ 早く出てけ

translation.en: I'll get the hell out when I'm goddamn good and ready!
-[woman] Sid. -[Sid] What?
-Blood pressure! -Keep watching your bullshit judge show,
translation.ja: 血圧 ロンダはやらせ番組でも見てろ

translation.en: will you, Rhonda?
translation.ja: ロンダはやらせ番組でも見てろ

translation.en: And stay out of this!
Jesus, God.
This is why I'm here.
What's this?
You know, I told your mama I'd take care of you always,
translation.ja: 母親にはずっと面倒を見ると言ったが

translation.en: but in this case, I think even she would cut me some slack.
translation.ja: 彼女もきっと許してくれるだろう

translation.en: I'm buying you out of my life.
I'd rather be homeless than take money from you.
Oh, well, hell. Yeah, OK.
Rhonda!
Lunchtime!
Call Art's.
See if they got the belly lox.
I'd say… get your life in order, but, uh…
translation.ja: 人生を立て直せと言いたいが

translation.en: at this point, you're like the meat in your fridge.
translation.ja: 今のお前は冷蔵庫の肉と同じだな

translation.en: Chappy! Chappy, where are you?
Just put in that tape. That's an order!
translation.ja: 録音を聞け　私に構うな

translation.en: -Nothing you can do about me. -[man 1] Chappy, I want to help you!
translation.ja: 録音を聞け　私に構うな 助けに行きたい

translation.en: Where are you?
[Chappy] Climb high, like I told you!
-[alarm buzzing on television] -Doug, I ain't gonna make it.
-[explosion on television] -Chappy!
[man on tape] A bunch of things must have gone wrong if you're listening to this.
translation.ja: これを聞いてるなら問題が起きたんだな

translation.en: Whatever happened, I know you must be real scared.
translation.ja: ものすごく怖いはずだ

translation.en: Right now, you're probably filled with all the doubts in the world.
translation.ja: 何ひとつ信じられないだろう

translation.en: But I'm gonna tell you something, Dougie.
God doesn't give people things He doesn't want 'em to use.
translation.ja: 神が授けたものには意味がある

translation.en: And He gave you the touch.
It's a power you have inside of you,
down there where you keep your guts, boy.
It's all you need to blast your way in and get back what they took from you.
translation.ja: 本領を発揮し奪われたものを取り返せ

translation.en: Banzai!
Daniel LaRusso here for LaRusso Auto, bringing you specials on all of our inventory.
translation.ja: ダニエル･ラルーソが全車を特別価格でご提供

translation.en: We have an excess of Jeep Grand Cherokees priced to go. Get a lease for only…
translation.ja: グランドチェロキーのリース料は たったの…

translation.en: Nah. Make that… Chop!
translation.ja: いや これをチョップ

translation.en: Yes, we are chopping prices on all of our Hondas, Nissans, Acuras, and Audis.
translation.ja: 加えてホンダ 日産アキュラ アウディも

translation.en: So come visit any of our locations in Tarzana, Woodland Hills, North Hollywood or Sherman Oaks.
translation.ja: どうぞ ターザナ他の各支店にお越しを

translation.en: And as always, every customer leaves with their very own bonsai tree.
translation.ja: いつもどおりお客様には盆栽を進呈

translation.en: LaRusso Auto Group. We kick the competition.
translation.ja: ラルーソ･オート競合を蹴散らします

translation.en: ♪ These daydreams ♪
[Johnny] I got second place.
[man] Second place is no place! You're off the team!
-[Johnny] That sucks! I did my best. -What did you say?
-[Johnny] I said I did my best! -You're nothing! You lost! You're a loser!
translation.ja: 精一杯やった きさまは負け犬だ

translation.en: -[Johnny] No, you're the loser, man. -Oh, I'm the loser, huh?
-Now who's the loser? -[Johnny] You know, you're really sick.
translation.ja: これでもか 最低だ

translation.en: How does second place feel now, huh?
-[boy 1] Come on! He can't breathe. -Mind your business!
[boy 2] You're gonna kill him!
[boy 1] Sensei, please! You're hurting him!
[man] How does second place feel now, huh?
-[girl gasps] -Oh my God.
I told you, you shouldn't be on your phone.
-What the-- -[liquor bottle smashes]
-What are we gonna do? -We have to call the police.
translation.ja: どうしよう 警察へ

translation.en: -We can't! My parents will kill me! -What the hell are you doing?
translation.ja: 親に殺される 何をしやがる

translation.en: -What are you doing? Open the door! -[girls screaming] Open the door!
translation.ja: どういうつもりだドアを開けろ

translation.en: Drive! Drive!
Hey! Where do you think you're going? Where do you think you're going?
translation.ja: どこへ行く気だ　逃げるな

translation.en: Shit!
Oh, come o--
-Take care of her. She's a classic. -Mm-hmm.
-Hey, where do I pick it up? -It's on the card.
translation.ja: 引き取りは？ 書いてある

translation.en: [Johnny] LaRusso? No, no, no.
Oh, come on.
How you doing? Would you be interested in--
No.
[woman] You're all set.
-Have a great day. -[man 1] Thank you.
translation.ja: では よい一日を どうも

translation.en: Hi, welcome to LaRusso. How can I help you?
translation.ja: ようこそ　ご用件は？

translation.en: Hi, I just need to pick up my car.
I'm in a bit of a hurry.
Oh, this came in last night?
It'll be a couple of weeks, but we'll call you with an estimate.
translation.ja: 数週間かかりますが予定日を

translation.en: No, my car was not supposed to come here. I want it towed to a different body shop.
translation.ja: いや 別の店で修理したいんだよ

translation.en: Why? We have the number one service team in the Valley.
translation.ja: サービスはバレーで一番ですよ

translation.en: We beat all prices. We kick the competition.
translation.ja: 料金も“競合を蹴散らします”

translation.en: I've heard it a million times. I just prefer to do my business elsewhere.
translation.ja: 百万回 聞いたが他がいい

translation.en: [man 2] And here are the watering instructions.
Thanks for being returning customers.
Before you go, Mr. LaRusso wanted to thank you personally. Let me go get him.
translation.ja: ラルーソさんが直々にお礼をと

translation.en: -Can you hurry it up? I gotta go. -[woman] Hold on.
translation.ja: 急いでくれ お待ちを

translation.en: Um, it says your car is in one of our intake lots.
translation.ja: 保管庫なので調べますね

translation.en: -I'll figure out which one. -You know what? I'll come back tomorrow.
translation.ja: 保管庫なので調べますね 明日 来るよ

translation.en: [woman] But, sir, I--
[Daniel] Johnny?
Johnny Lawrence! I… I… I knew it was you!
translation.ja: ジョニー･ロレンス君だと思った

translation.en: Holy… How the hell are you?
-Hey, man. -[chuckles]
[Daniel] Oh my God, look at you.
You still got those golden locks, eh?
God, this is crazy. How you been?
translation.ja: 会えるとは　元気か

translation.en: -Great, man. Thanks, I've been great. -That's great.
translation.ja: ああ どうも そうか

translation.en: Anoush, come here! Louie, get over here! I want you to meet somebody.
translation.ja: アヌーシュとルイ紹介するよ

translation.en: -I gotta go. -No, no, no. This is Johnny Lawrence. He and I go way back. Right, buddy?
translation.ja: ジョニー･ロレンス昔からのつきあいだな

translation.en: This guy was the toughest dude in my high school.
When I first moved here from Jersey, he and I… we got into a little bit.
translation.ja: 僕が引っ越してきた時少しモメたよ

translation.en: This guy really had it in for me.
Well, you did move in on my girl.
Well, she actually wasn't really your girl anymore, was she?
translation.ja: 実際にはもう恋人じゃなかっただろ

translation.en: I mean…
All right. That's all water under the bridge.
Wait. Is this the karate guy, the guy from the tournament?
translation.ja: 待てよ　空手大会の人？

translation.en: Oh, this is the guy whose ass you kicked.
[Daniel] Uh, listen, it was a really close match.
But if you wanna get technical…
I kicked his face.
-[Daniel, Louie laughing] -I'm just busting your chops.
translation.ja: 顔を蹴った からかっただけだ

translation.en: It was an illegal kick.
Oh, illegal? Really? Come on. What about that elbow to my knee?
Yeah, I got a warning. You got the win.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! No fighting in the showroom, guys.
[Daniel] Come on. All right, back to work.
-Nice meeting you. -Get back to work.
Enough reminiscing, right?
So, what brings you in? You're looking for a new a ride?
He wants his car towed to a different body shop.
translation.ja: 別の店で修理したいと

translation.en: Oh no, Johnny. We got the best prices in town.
That crook at Cole's on Van Nuys, he'll try to screw you over.
translation.ja: コールの店は吹っかける

translation.en: Sheila, let me see the estimate.
A Pontiac?
-Firebird? -Yeah.
Wow, someone did a real number on this thing.
Maybe it's time for an upgrade. Why don't we walk the lot? I'll give you a deal on a certified pre-owned--
translation.ja: 買い替えたら？中古車を安く…

translation.en: I just want my car.
All right, all right. You got it, all right?
Let me see how low I can get this repair.
Friends and family… my own personal code.
translation.ja: 家族割引に僕のコード

translation.en: You know what? It's on the house.
-No way. I don't need your charity. -No, you'd be doing me a favor.
translation.ja: 施しは不要だ 僕にも得が

translation.en: Our guys aren't used to working on a car like this. They could use the practice. You could use the repairs.
translation.ja: 社員も古い車の修理は勉強になる

translation.en: -This is a win-win. -I said I'll handle it.
All right.
OK, but it's… John, it's gonna cost more than the car is worth.
translation.ja: でも車両代より高くつくぞ

translation.en: Listen, don't worry about it. It's my pleasure, all right?
translation.ja: なあ 喜んで修理するよ

translation.en: -All right. -OK? Just hang here a second.
translation.ja: いいね 渡す物がある　待ってて

translation.en: I got something for you. One minute.
translation.ja: 渡す物がある　待ってて

translation.en: Fuck.
-Hey, Dad! -[Daniel] Look who's here.
-[screaming] -What are you doing? Open the door!
-I'm good. -You gotta be kidding me.
Of course. Go ahead. In the office.
-[girl] See you later. -OK.
Hey, Johnny, wait up!
Johnny! Wait up.
Every customer gets one.
And, hey, look, I don't blame you for what happened back in the day.
translation.ja: それから僕は君を恨んでないよ

translation.en: All right, I know that wasn't you. It was Cobra Kai.
translation.ja: 悪いのは君じゃなくてコブラ会だ

translation.en: We're all better off without it, am I right?
Take care of yourself, and I'll call you when the car's ready, OK?
translation.ja: じゃあな　修理後 連絡する

translation.en: This is crazy! You look… You look… It's good to see you, man.
translation.ja: 驚いたけど会えてよかった

translation.en: Are you sure you're ready?
'Cause once you go down this path, there's no turning back.
-You're gonna be my karate teacher? -No.
translation.ja: 空手の講師に？ いや

translation.en: I'm gonna be your sensei.
I'm gonna teach you the style of karate that was taught to me,
translation.ja: 習った空手を教えてやる

translation.en: a method of fighting your pussy generation desperately needs.
translation.ja: ヘタレ(プッシー)世代に必要な戦法だ

translation.en: -[man] Good luck. It's all yours. -All right.
translation.ja: これで君のだ ああ

translation.en: I'm not just gonna teach you how to conquer your fears. I'm gonna teach you how to awaken the snake within you.
translation.ja: 恐怖に打ち勝ち内なるヘビを呼び起こせ

translation.en: And once you do that,
translation.ja: そうすればお前自身が恐怖となる

translation.en: you'll be the one who's feared.
translation.ja: そうすればお前自身が恐怖となる 〝先に打て　強く打て情け無用〞

translation.en: You'll build strength.
You'll learn discipline.
And when the time is right,
you'll strike back.
